channel.title: AEJOICACOU
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: Timeline
item.description:
Early Days of Limbo (-777352734 years)
First Arrival: Initial colonization of the planet when native species begin their evolutionary journey (-77234784 years)
Planet becomes Limbo dump ground for Realms: (-73211854 years)
Human and Native Conflict: The native inhabitants are becoming more involved in conflicts with the new arrivals, as the planet's old species now fight to maintain their place in the world
Emergence of the First Demon and Angelic Leaders: Early power struggles form between those who rise up in both the Heavenly Limbo and Deathly Limbo
First Use of Ring Runes: The Halo create the massive runes (Ring Runes) around the twilight zone, acting as a barrier between the light and dark sides of the planet, pushing the realms into their designated territories
Planetary Strife: Conflict is rising between the Heavenly Limbo and Deathly Limbo; the Ring Runes are beginning to weaken as the two realms push against the barrier
Carnivorl Rising: The Carnivorl Realm (the chaotic clown-themed zone) is starting to gain in influence, offering a dangerous third-party force, with its drug-powered madness spilling into both limbos
Shifting Borders: The twilight zone is becoming unstable, with pockets of chaos starting to leak into areas previously untouched (current 0)
Orbital Decay: The barycenter — the gravitational midpoint of the binary system — begins to collapse, threatening the balance between the white star and black hole. This imbalance begins affecting the entire planet’s orbit and climate (+6854223 years)
